org.threadly.concurrent.limiter

Class AbstractSchedulerLimiter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.threadly.concurrent.limiter.AbstractThreadPoolLimiter
      • org.threadly.concurrent.limiter.AbstractSchedulerLimiter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PrioritySchedulerLimiter, SubmitterSchedulerLimiter

    public abstract class AbstractSchedulerLimiter
extends AbstractThreadPoolLimiter
    Abstract limiter for any implementations which need to schedule and handle futures.

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  AbstractSchedulerLimiter.LimiterCallableWrapper<T>

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractSchedulerLimiter

        protected AbstractSchedulerLimiter(int maxConcurrency,
                        java.lang.String subPoolName)
        Constructor for abstract class to call into for anyone extending this class.
        Parameters:
        maxConcurrency - maximum qty of runnables to run in parallel
        subPoolName - name to give threads while tasks running in pool (null to not change thread names)
